column1: It's 2020 We've had World War 3 Australia has burned There's been earthquakes in Turkey and Jamaica Kobe's dead A volcano erupted in The Philippines And now Corona Virus is about to wipe out whoever's left. And it's STILL fucking January #coronavirus
I don't care if your dads mates uncles nans girlfriends brother lives in China and says it's not that bad. My TV was made in China and that's telling me it is, so zip it #coronavirus
